name: 20 Second Fishing
description:
Help Wizard catch as many fish as possible in only 20 seconds. Why does he have 20 seconds? Stop asking so many questions! Made for the 20 Second Game Jam.

Press the spacebar when the fish icon lines up with the red target along the bottom. Successful hits land you one fish, while misses will take one away. 

Everything was made by me, except for the music, which is 'Bonus Round' by Wolfgang on opengameart.org/
